column3: Cannot operate/launch without it. Required for legal compliance, core infrastructure, or safety-critical features. Budget immediately (0-3 months).
Needed for quality, compliance, or scale. Professional services at user milestones. Plan within 6-12 months or triggered by growth.
Beneficial but timing is flexible. Marketing tools (wait for revenue), enhanced features, professional services (can DIY initially). Plan 12-24 months or revenue-triggered.
Speculative or far-future. Enterprise features, international expansion, significant team scaling. Consider only at 24+ months or major pivot.

column10: Notes
PRIMARY development tool for single developer + AI-assisted model. Currently in use. Essential for productivity.
Required for production deployment. Includes unlimited builds + EAS Update (OTA). No separate OTA cost.
500MB DB + 2GB bandwidth/month. Current tier. Supports ~10K users / ~300 DAU due to offline-first design.
8GB DB + 50GB bandwidth + 2M edge function invocations. Milestone-based upgrade when exceeding free tier.
Only needed if BAA required (architecture pivot) or >100GB bandwidth. Unlikely with current privacy-first design.
Contingency for Supabase bandwidth spikes. Monitor usage and implement rate limiting.
Currently in use. Free for single developer. Upgrade to Team ($4/user/mo) only when hiring.
Current tier. 2000 minutes/month sufficient for ~100 commits/month. Includes all test automation.
When exceeding 2000 min/mo (~200 commits/month). Alternative: Self-hosted runners on $5/mo VPS.
Required for FEAT-38 (web subscriptions) and professional email. Annual renewal. Can defer until web feature.
Currently in use. All free/open-source tools. Includes VS Code extensions, Prettier, ESLint.
5K events/month. Implement at 500-1K users for production stability. Critical for production readiness.
50K events/month. Milestone-based upgrade. Updated 2025 pricing (was $26/mo).
500K events/month. Later milestone. Updated 2025 pricing (was $80/mo).
Included with Expo + Supabase. Required for app operation. Apple Developer Program includes certificates.
Periodic consultation (quarterly/bi-annually) for classical source interpretation, framework integrity validation, prevents pop-philosophy dilution. NOT continuous FTE.
Solo developer + philosopher agent validation for 5 core principles, 4 developmental stages. Your time = $0 in model. Initial core product content development.
CRITICAL for supporting user progression through developmental stages (Fragmented → Effortful → Fluid → Integrated). Ongoing content evolution. Essential, not optional.

CRITICAL for framework integrity. Validates classical accuracy (Marcus Aurelius, Epictetus, Seneca), prevents pop-philosophy dilution. Required for all major content updates. Quarterly review recommended.
11 development markers for tracking user progress through 4 stages. Critical for personalization. Initial development time (your time).
Updates to neuroscience justification (DMN, attention networks) as research evolves. Maintains scientific credibility but timing flexible.
Safety validation for Stoic negative visualization practices. CRITICAL for vulnerable users (GAD≥15). Clinical + philosophical review required before launch. One-time pre-launch validation.

CRITICAL. Initial implementation of crisis detection thresholds (PHQ≥15, PHQ≥20, GAD≥15) and 988 integration. Development/setup time (your time). Always free to user, always available. No external costs.
Updates to crisis detection algorithms and safety protocols as clinical standards evolve. Your time. Quality maintenance.
PHQ-9/GAD-7 implementation accuracy validation (100% required), crisis threshold verification. Automated testing covers this. Launch requirement.
ONE-TIME legal counsel confirmation that NO PHI transmitted, eliminating BAA requirements. Critical success factor unlocking $108K-326K savings over 5 years. Pre-launch.
CCPA/VCDPA/GDPR privacy policy drafting, state-specific compliance review (CA/VA/CO), consent framework design. Required for App Store launch.
Quarterly privacy policy reviews, state law updates monitoring, annual comprehensive review. Ongoing compliance maintenance.
Terms of Service drafting, Privacy Policy (mental health specific), Data Retention Policy. Required for App Store launch.
Quarterly reviews, ad-hoc consultations, regulatory change reviews. Hourly rate model more cost-effective than retainer for solo dev.
Included in Legal Counsel (Ongoing) costs. Regular maintenance as laws evolve.
Pre-launch security review, encryption implementation validation (AES-256-GCM), PHI exclusion validation. Launch requirement.
Annual security audit, post-major-release reviews. Every 18-24 months after Year 1. Quality and compliance maintenance.

Data breach ($1M), privacy liability ($1M), network security ($500K). Annual premiums. ADVISABLE for mental health app despite BAA-free design. Scales: $800-1500 (0-5K users), $1500-2500 (5K-50K), $2500-5K (50K+).
NOT needed for consumer app. Annual certification cost if pursuing B2B/enterprise healthcare partnerships. Verify Supabase has SOC 2 Type II (no cost to Being).
Privacy Nutrition Label (Apple), Data Safety Section (Google). Launch requirement. Primarily developer time (8-16 hours).
Quarterly review for policy changes, updates for new app features. Developer time (2-4 hours/quarter). Ongoing compliance.
Affirmative opt-in consent UI (CCPA/VCDPA requirement for sensitive health data), consent audit trail, legal review of consent language. Launch requirement.
Consent flow A/B testing, consent language updates. Optimization not critical path.
Incident response plan development, breach notification templates, vendor breach coordination procedures. Should have before significant user base.
Annual IR plan testing, plan updates for regulatory changes. Can reduce cyber insurance premiums by 10-20%.
k-anonymity validation library, differential privacy implementation, PHI detection system. Tooling cost: $0-1000 (OSS libraries). Development time AI-accelerable. Quality assurance.
State-by-state regulatory analysis, mental health-specific app requirements (CA, NY, IL). Can phase by state of initial users.
State regulatory change tracking, compliance updates for new states. Scales with geographic expansion.
NOT currently integrated. Recommended at 5K+ users or $50K MRR. Zendesk Suite Team $49/agent/mo to Professional $99/agent/mo.
Part-time support for user inquiries, technical issues. Scales with user base. Trigger: 5K users.
FREE government service. Native integration via tel: link. No external partnership needed. Continuous availability. Safety-critical feature.
NOT currently implemented. Recommended for user retention. SendGrid Essentials $15/mo (40K emails) to Mailchimp $50/mo. Revenue-dependent.
Future feature. In-app help, FAQs, troubleshooting guides. Development time (your time). Nice-to-have.
No current marketing infrastructure. Future pre-launch and ongoing content creation. Your time. Timing flexible.
No current ad SDK integration. Future if growth strategy includes paid channels (Apple Search Ads, Google, Meta). Budget when CAC economics justify.
Overlap with Email/Onboarding Automation. Same tools (SendGrid, Mailchimp). 1K+ user milestone.
ZERO COST. Custom privacy-preserving analytics (BAA-free, differential privacy ε=0.1, k-anonymity k≥5). NO third-party vendors (Amplitude, Mixpanel). Saves $2000-5000/month. Currently implemented.
NO attribution SDKs (Adjust, AppsFlyer, Branch). Privacy-first strategy. Future low priority.
Not in current codebase. Future feature if monetization strategy includes affiliates.
Future marketing channel. Annual conference sponsorships, virtual events for Stoic Mindfulness education. Professional development overlap.
Business accounting services, tax preparation, financial reporting. Required for business operation.
Additional accounting for increased transaction volume, payroll, etc. Scales with complexity.
15% (subscriptions after year 1 for retained subscribers), 30% (monthly subscriptions). NOT separate processing fee, taken from revenue. Core revenue model.
15% (first $1M revenue/year), 30% (after $1M revenue/year). NOT separate processing fee. Core revenue model.
Implemented but not primary (IAP-first). For FEAT-38 (web subscriptions). Plus international card fees. Future feature.
Business checking account monthly fees. Required for business operation.
QuickBooks Online, Xero, or Wave. Essential for financial management.
General business insurance, professional liability, errors & omissions coverage. Annual premiums. Advisable for mental health app.
Liability protection for business decisions. Annual premiums. Important but can defer to revenue.
Only needed when hiring employees. Annual premiums. Not relevant to solo dev model.
Microsoft 365 Business Standard (email, productivity), Notion (project management). Currently in use.
Additional tools as needs scale. Analytics, monitoring, development tools. Growth-dependent.
LLC annual reports, business licenses, registered agent fees. Legal requirement.
Annual $99 fee. Required for App Store distribution, Sign in with Apple, TestFlight. Cannot launch without this.
One-time $25 fee. Required for Play Store distribution. Cannot launch Android without this.
Business phone, VoIP service, communication tools. Professional but can use personal initially.
Google Workspace, Dropbox Business, or similar for business file storage. Data protection important.
1Password Business, LastPass Business. Essential security tool. Currently needed.
NordVPN Teams, ExpressVPN Business for secure development. Good practice but not immediate.
Supplies, software licenses, unexpected operational costs. Buffer category.
Buffer for unexpected costs, infrastructure failures, emergency fixes. Prudent financial planning.
Buffer for variable cost spikes, seasonal fluctuations, growth surges. Prudent financial planning.
Vercel free + SendGrid free ($0-27/mo pre-revenue) OR Vercel Pro $20 + SendGrid $15 + domain ($40-65/mo post-revenue). For web subscriptions via Stripe. Priority Score: 0 (low urgency).
XXL effort (8+ weeks solo dev time). Your time = $0. Priority Score: 0 (low urgency). Defer until revenue justifies. One-time development project.
Large effort (3-5 weeks solo dev time). NO additional tooling costs. Priority Score: 15.6 (HIGH). Enables all analytics features. Plan for 6-12 months. One-time migration project.

Email/password auth via Supabase Auth (FREE). Email delivery $0 (free tier 30K emails/mo) to $5/mo overage. XXL effort (8+ weeks). Blocks 3 features. Priority 2.5. Plan for 6-12 months. One-time development with potential ongoing email costs.
Public domain texts (FREE). Optional audio narration $100-500. Medium effort (2-3 weeks). Priority 10.4. Content enhancement. One-time curation.
Solo content development (FREE). Optional Stoic philosophy expert review $1000-2000. XL effort (5-8 weeks). Priority 3.0. Content enhancement. One-time development.
Development time only. No additional infrastructure. Large effort. Priority 4.7. Feature enhancement. One-time development.
Figma Free (sufficient for solo) or Professional $15/editor/mo for unlimited files, advanced features. Can start free.
Noun Project, IconScout. Optional for polish. React Native Vector Icons (FREE) sufficient.
Free tier or Creator $35/mo. Needed for roadmap P1-P2 features (breathing timer, badges). Plan for implementation phase.
App icon ($100-500) + screenshots ($200-800) for iOS + Android. Consider DIY with Figma to reduce to $0. Launch requirement. One-time design.
Updates per major release (2-4×/year). $100-300 per update. Quality maintenance.
Optional but high ROI for App Store conversion. Can defer to post-launch. One-time production.

Freelancer for logo suite, color palette, typography, basic brand guidelines for Stoic Mindfulness positioning. Phase 2 refinement $2K-5K optional. Important for launch quality. One-time branding work.
One-time purchase: 2 iOS devices (current + 1-2 gen old) + 2 Android devices (mid-range + budget). Minimum for iOS/Android QA. Refresh $500-1000 every 2-3 years. Can use cloud alternative.
Expo Device Cloud INCLUDED in EAS Build Production plan ($99/mo already budgeted). Access to 100+ real devices. Currently available.
Apple TestFlight FREE. Google Play Internal Testing FREE. For beta users and QA. Continuous testing capability. Launch requirement.
Included in GitHub Actions line items above. Full test suite, clinical accuracy, crisis detection, performance, security. Currently implemented.
Some free (React Native Accessibility), some paid. WCAG AA compliance testing. Quality enhancement.
Maze or UserTesting.com. Post-launch product validation. Recommended at 5K+ users. Growth-dependent.
PRIMARY MODEL. Single developer (you) with AI coding assistance. Your time = $0 in model. Core operating model.
Future if specific expertise needed (advanced animations, native modules). $50-150/hr. Trigger: 25K users or critical need. Unlikely.
Future for specialized design work (app redesign, marketing materials). $50-100/hr. Can DIY with AI tools.
Future if product complexity increases. User research, roadmap, feature prioritization. $75-150/hr. Trigger: 50K users. Very unlikely.
Udemy, Pluralsight, conferences. Stay current with React Native, Expo, security best practices. Professional growth.
Apple developer conference. Annual event. $1599 ticket. Virtual attendance FREE. Nice-to-have networking.
Stoic Week, mental health conferences for networking and learning. Annual events. Travel + registration. Optional networking.
Books, academic journals, online courses on Stoicism. Content quality enhancement.
Local tech/startup meetups, mental health networking. Post-revenue. Optional.
Mental Health America, philosophy associations, app developer groups. Annual memberships. Post-revenue. Optional.
Outreach to Stoic organizations, wellness partnerships. Post-revenue. Optional.
Initially equity. Cash compensation at scale. Optional.
